column4: My ubuntu is automounting all my windows partations at boot time as root, is there any way to force ubuntu to mount them under given user name so that ordernary users doen't need to have sudo access ?
can anybody help me with my automounting as root problem ?
Are you using dapper or edgy?
Then it should be the udev thing. Try tweaking in /etc/udev/rules.d/40-permission.rules
